queries.name: List Computers where DOMAIN USERS are Local Admin

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) WHERE m.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Path from DOMAIN USERS to High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (g:Group),(n {highvalue:true}),p=shortestPath((g)-[r*1..]->(n)) WHERE g.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' return p

queries.name: ALL Path from DOMAIN USERS to High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (g:Group) WHERE g.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS'  MATCH (n {highvalue:true}),p=shortestPath((g)-[r*1..]->(n)) return p

queries.name: Find Workstations where DOMAIN USERS can RDP To

queryList.query: match p=(g:Group)-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) where g.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' AND NOT c.operatingsystem CONTAINS 'Server' return p

queries.name: Find Servers where DOMAIN USERS can RDP To

queryList.query: match p=(g:Group)-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) where g.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' AND c.operatingsystem CONTAINS 'Server' return p

queries.name: Find all other Rights DOMAIN USERS shouldnâ€™t have

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:Owns|:WriteDacl|:GenericAll|:WriteOwner|:ExecuteDCOM|:GenericWrite|:AllowedToDelegate|:ForceChangePassword]->(n:Computer) WHERE m.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' RETURN p

queries.name: Kerberoastable Accounts member of High Value Group

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User)-[r:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE g.highvalue=true AND n.hasspn=true RETURN n, g, r

queries.name: List all Kerberoastable Accounts

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User)WHERE n.hasspn=true RETURN n

queries.name: DA Account Sessions to NON DC

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer)-[:MemberOf]->(t:Group) WHERE NOT t.name = 'DOMAIN CONTROLLERS@TESTLAB.LOCAL' WITH c as NonDC MATCH p=(NonDC)-[:HasSession]->(n:User)-[:MemberOf]-> (g:Group {name:'DOMAIN ADMINS@TESTLAB.LOCAL'}) RETURN p

queries.name: Top Ten Computers with Most Admins

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)-[r:AdminTo]->(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH m, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(m)<-[r:AdminTo]-(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Top Ten Computers with Most Sessions

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)<-[r:HasSession]-(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH m, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(m)-[r:HasSession]->(n) RETURN n,r,m

queries.name: Top Ten Users with Most Local Admin Rights

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)-[r:AdminTo]->(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH n, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(m)<-[r:AdminTo]-(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all owned Domain Admins
queries.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.name =~ {name} WITH n MATCH p=(n)<-[r:MemberOf*1..]-(m) WHERE exists(m.owned) AND NONE (x IN nodes(p) WHERE exists(x.blacklist)) AND NONE (x in relationships(p) WHERE exists(x.blacklist)) RETURN nodes(p),relationships(p)

queries.name: Find Shortest Paths from owned node to Domain Admins

nodeSelectQuery.onFinish: MATCH (n),(m:Group {name:{result}}),p=shortestPath((n)-[*1..12]->(m)) WHERE exists(n.owned) AND NONE (x IN nodes(p) WHERE exists(x.blacklist)) AND NONE (x in relationships(p) WHERE exists(x.blacklist)) RETURN p

queries.name: Find Shortest Paths to DA Equivalency
All Shortest Path - Owned to HighValue

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((O {owned: True})-[r:{}*1..]->(H {highvalue: True})) RETURN p

queries.name: All Shortest Path - Owned to HighValue - Exclude Blacklist

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((O {owned: True})-[r:{}*1..]->(H {highvalue: True})) WHERE NONE(x IN NODES(p) WHERE x:Blacklist) RETURN p

queries.name: Owned - View All

queryList.query: MATCH (x {owned: True}) RETURN x

queries.name: Owned - Clear All

queryList.query: MATCH (x {owned: True}) SET x.owned=False

queries.name: HighValue - View All

queryList.query: MATCH (x {highvalue: True}) RETURN x

queries.name: HighValue - Clear All

queryList.query: MATCH (x {highvalue: True}) SET x.highvalue=False

queries.name: Blacklist - View All

queryList.query: MATCH (x:Blacklist) RETURN x

queries.name: Blacklist - Add User

queryList.query: MATCH (x:User) RETURN x.name ORDER BY x.name
MATCH (x:User) WHERE x.name={result} SET x:Blacklist

queries.name: Blacklist - Add Group

queryList.query: MATCH (x:Group) RETURN x.name ORDER BY x.name
MATCH (x:Group) WHERE x.name={result} SET x:Blacklist

queries.name: Blacklist - Add Computer

queryList.query: MATCH (x:Computer) RETURN x.name ORDER BY x.name
MATCH (x:Computer) WHERE x.name={result} SET x:Blacklist

queries.name: Blacklist - Remove User

queryList.query: MATCH (x:User:Blacklist) RETURN x.name ORDER BY x.name
MATCH (x:User) WHERE x.name={result} REMOVE x:Blacklist

queries.name: Blacklist - Remove Group

queryList.query: MATCH (x:Group:Blacklist) RETURN x.name ORDER BY x.name
MATCH (x:Group) WHERE x.name={result} REMOVE x:Blacklist

queries.name: Blacklist - Remove Computer

queryList.query: MATCH (x:Computer:Blacklist) RETURN x.name ORDER BY x.name
MATCH (x:Computer) WHERE x.name={result} REMOVE x:Blacklist

queries.name: Blacklist - Clear All

queryList.query: MATCH (x:Blacklist) REMOVE x:Blacklist
